thread.title: 'Angry' AshantiGold CEO Kudjoe Fianoo resigns as Black Stars management committee member
thread.title_full: 'Angry' AshantiGold CEO Kudjoe Fianoo resigns as Black Stars management committee member

title: 'Angry' AshantiGold CEO Kudjoe Fianoo resigns as Black Stars management committee member
text:
Sports News | 2 October 2015 09:55 CET 'Angry' AshantiGold CEO Kudjoe Fianoo resigns as Black Stars management committee member - www.ghanasoccernet.com Kudjoe Fianoo 
AshantiGold Chief Executive Kudjoe Fianoo has decided to resign from his positions at the Ghana Football Association days after losing the Executive Committee election. 
Fianoo has stepped down as the Black Stars management committee member and chairman of the association's Media Committee. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
